p: The aim of this study is to highlight the potential use of CEO as an alternative to synthetic pesticides in organic technologies. In this regard, our study focused on the in vitro and in vivo antifungal potential of CEO against F. graminearum, as well the bio-herbicide potential against weed seed germination of Amaranthus retroflexus (ARET), Chenopodium album (CALB), and Echinochloa crus-galli (EGAL). In addition, in light of recent research on the synergy of EOs [ 19], an increase in CEO performance was sought by the addition of Satureja hortensis essential oil (SEO) in various ratios.
